# Format Settings

**API Collection**

The audio settings that apply to all audio formats that the audio player and recorder classes support.

## Settings

- **AVFormatIDKey**: An integer value that represents the format of the audio data.
- **AVSampleRateKey**: A floating point value that represents the sample rate, in hertz.
- **AVNumberOfChannelsKey**: An integer value that represents the number of channels.

## Formats

- **AVAudioFormat**: An object that describes the representation of an audio format.
- **AVAudioChannelLayout**: An object that describes the roles of a set of audio channels.
- **AVChannelLayoutKey**
- **Linear PCM Format Settings**: The audio settings that apply to linear PCM audio formats.
